title: 2 California wildfires remain out of control
shortDescription: (CNN)Firefighters Saturday are continuing to battle two out-of-control California blazes that have scorched almost 120,000 acres.
content: (CNN) Firefighters Saturday are continuing to battle two out-of-control California blazes that have scorched almost 120,000 acres.The Glass Fire in wine country has burned 62,360 acres and is 10% contained, according to Cal Fire LNU.The deadly Zogg Fire blazing in Shasta and Tehama counties has burned 56,305 acres and is 57% contained as of Saturday morning, according to Cal Fire. Four people have died as a result of the vegetation fire that started Sunday. The cause is still under investigation.The weather forecast doesn't provide much hope for fire-ravaged California.
